short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that grabs the emails from a schoology memebers page to make emailing classes easier

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows the users to gather and create custom email buttons for their classes or blocks that can be copied anywhere needed.
